abstract: Senator Charles E. Grassley has asked Medtronic to explain any payments made to spine surgeons since its settlement last year over accusations that the company had paid kickbacks to doctors.
snippet: Senator Charles E. Grassley has asked Medtronic to explain any payments made to spine surgeons since its settlement last year over accusations that the company had paid kickbacks to doctors.
lead_paragraph: An influential senator is raising new questions about payments made to spine surgeons by Medtronic, one of the nation’s largest makers of medical devices.

headline.main: Medtronic, Again Questioned Over Payments to Doctors, Is Subject of Senator’s Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Medtronic, Again Questioned Over Payments to Doctors, Is Subject of Senator’s Inquiry
